artist: Engraver: Thomas Ryder; Painter: After W. R. Bigg A.R.A.; Publisher: P. & D. Colnaghi and Co., Ltd.
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet in black: T. Ryder Sculpt   W.R. Bigg pinx't / COTTAGE GIRL SHELLING PEASE /  London Published as the Act Directs for the Proprietor Jan 10, 1793 by Colnaghi & Co. No.[ ] Pall Mall & / T Ryder No. 43 Titchfield St. Oxford St. | on sheet in pencil: 2-715
title: Cottage Girl Shelling Pease
